text: God gave us the gift of life; it is up to us to give ourselves the gift of living well
author: Voltaire

text: You can never plan the future by the past
author: Edmund Burke

text: Be like a tree and let the dead leaves drop
author: Rumi

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
author: Mae West

text: Life is a question and how we live it is our answer
author: Gary Keller

text: It’s easier to be wise for others than for yourself.
author: R.J. Lawrence

text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: Build your own dreams, or someone else will hire you to build theirs.
author: Farrah Gray

text: Fall seven times and stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

text: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions
author: Stephen Covey

text: There are people who have money and people who are rich
author: Coco Chanel

text: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough
author: Mae West

text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, I’m possible!
author: Audrey Hepburn
